name: SPEC_ARCH_ORD_DX
description: This table extracts the related multiple response item Archived Order Associated Diagnoses (I OVS 33008), which contains the list of diagnoses associated with an archived order.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.
